meanings.definition: The quality or state of being triaxial.
meanings.sent1: The triaxialities of the crystal structure were studied in detail.
meanings.sent2: The scientist explained the concept of triaxialities to the students.
meanings.sent3: The triaxialities of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved in different triaxialities, each leading to a new idea.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the triaxialities of nature in a beautiful painting.

meanings.definition: The condition of having three axes or principal directions.
meanings.sent1: The triaxialities of the machine allowed for precise measurements in three directions.
meanings.sent2: The engineer adjusted the triaxialities of the equipment for optimal performance.
meanings.sent3: The triaxialities of the compass confused the hiker in the dense forest.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in triaxialities, considering all angles before making a decision.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved with grace, showcasing the triaxialities of her movements.
